usernames.title: Instagram Usernames
usernames.description: Enter a list of Instagram usernames to scrape.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of profiles to process in parallel. Higher concurrency is faster but may increase the chance of blocks.

proxyType.title: Proxy Group (or NONE)
proxyType.description: Enter the exact name of your proxy group from the Apify dashboard (e.g., RESIDENTIAL). To disable proxies, enter NONE.
